main event: An observer sighted a fluorescent blue object that beamed light, resembling the star ship Enterprise from Star Trek, in Fryeburg, Maine on 2 March 1963.
interesting points: The object was initially reported to be observed for 30 minutes, but the witness later amended this to 1 hour., The observer described the object as having wings., Despite its bright color, the object appeared hazy and indistinct., The report stated that the object hovered like the star ship Enterprise., There was no physical evidence or photographs accompanying the report.
witness description: an observer who described the object in detail
